subject: Pro X Ultra Order
description_text:
Hello,

i orderer the Pro X Ultra 2 Pedal Set with Haptic Motors. Today i 
recieved only the Motors and the Pedeals are still in "confirmed" 
status. Can you help me out here ?

Order Number is: #SSN3712

Regards

Daniel Gembalies

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Gembalies,  Hello, we ship items separately, so please don’t worry.
